short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replace Twitter's default emojis with native Apple's emojis for a more consistent and polished look.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform your Twitter/X experience with beautiful Apple iOS emojis! This extension automatically replaces Twitter's default emojis with Apple's iconic emoji designs, giving you a more refined and familiar look.

Key features:
• Seamlessly replaces all emojis on Twitter/X with Apple iOS emojis
• Works automatically as you browse and post
• Maintains consistent emoji sizing and alignment
• Supports the latest iOS emoji set
• Zero configuration required - install and enjoy!

Perfect for Apple users who want a more consistent emoji experience across their devices, or anyone who prefers Apple's emoji designs.
